name: 60 Second Alchemist
description:
Having set out to start her own potion shop, the budding young alchemist Hazel aims to prove her independence. With only 60 seconds each day to explore the resource rich magical weald linked to her shop, she must master navigating this land in order to have enough ingredients to make customers' potions to the upmost quality. Better potions sell for more after all, and if Hazel is to make rent, she needs to start selling.
